FAQ's

Emergency appointments
What if there is an emergency case that requires instant treatment?

For such patients, instant chat is available with the help of which basic first aid treatment will be provided to the patient.

Time slots
How can I view the time slots available for the doctor?

In case of booking an appointment for a later stage, patients need to fill date and time as per their convenience. In case, the doctor is busy, he will cancel or reschedule the appointment.In case of instant chat, the avaibility status of doctors would be displayed. It would red for budy, yellow for offline and grenn in case the doctor is online.

Scheduling more than 1 appointment
Can I schedule more than 1 appointment with the same doctor?

This can be done. The website doesn't prevent you from making multiple appointments with the same doctor.

Payment procedure
How is the payment done for booking an appointment or instant chat with the doctor?

For instant chat, once the consultation is completed, the patient would be redirected to the billing page. Payment would be made online. For scheduling an appointment for a later stage, advance payment has to be made online.

Edit/cancel booking
How can I change/ cancel my booking?

Visit the Edit Booking option on the homepage of our website which has a list of features that allow you to process changes/ cancellations.
